lead_paragraph: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr.’s annual report on the federal judiciary said that the dockets reflected a year of hardships and tough political issues.
snippet: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr.’s annual report on the federal judiciary said that the dockets reflected a year of hardships and tough political issues.

headline.print_headline: A Busy Year for Judiciary, Roberts Says
headline.main: A Busy Year for Judiciary, Roberts Says
headline.seo: Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. Says Courts Had Busy Year
headline.sub: Chief Justice’s Report Says Cases Reflected the Nation’s Hardships ;
